author: Bee Wilson
title: Soy, Almond, Pea or Oat? The Reinvention of Milk
text:
I was talking with a health-conscious woman recently who said that every time she went to a coffee shop, she agonized. Should she order her caffè latte with whole organic cow’s milk? Or should she go dairy-free? Soy milk gave her doubts because of deforestation (huge tracts in South America have been cleared to grow soy). She had gone through an almond milk phase, but now she felt that oat milk from Sweden might be a better option. It was both sustainable and frothy: double win.
